V001.meaning: [v] button clicked - tracks click count for debugging double-click issue

V002.meaning: Starting option generation for [v] button dropdown

V003.meaning: Updating checkbox states for [v] button dropdown

G002.meaning: Options container not found - critical error preventing dropdown

G003.meaning: Data processing results - shows filtered/unique/limited counts

G004.meaning: HTML generation completed - shows HTML length

G005.meaning: Option generation result - shows final children count

C001.meaning: Clear button clicked - removing column filter

D001.meaning: Dropdown state before move - shows if move needed and option count

D002.meaning: Dropdown state after move - shows final option count

U002.meaning: Checkbox container not found - cannot update checkbox states

U003.meaning: Checkbox update data - shows option and selected counts

U004.meaning: Checkbox state changed - shows which option and its new state

severity.MEDIUM: Non-critical issue that may affect functionality
severity.HIGH: Critical issue that prevents core functionality
